Text: For everyone who wants to know: it works completely:D but i think you have to be sure that, if you put it on an usb, you have to safely remove it from your pc to work
Do i need a jtag or modded xbox 360??

@duldi .. You don't need a Jtagged xbox360 for this to work. I'm using a flashed console though. I don't know if this will work on a clean unmodded 360.
@duldi Try burning the whole "Content" directory to a CD or DVD and try running it on your 360.
